statements: SELECT * FROM user_engagement;
SELECT user_id, username, email, engagement_score FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, preferred_content_type FROM user_engagement WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email, last_engagement_date FROM user_engagement ORDER BY last_engagement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50 AND preferred_content_type = 'video';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_engagement;
SELECT username, engagement_score, last_engagement_date FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE preferred_content_type = 'video' AND last_engagement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email, preferred_content_type FROM user_engagement ORDER BY last_engagement_date DESC;
SELECT username, engagement_score, last_engagement_date FROM user_engagement WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement;
SELECT user_id, engagement_date FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, time_spent_minutes FROM user_engagement WHERE time_spent_minutes > 30;
SELECT user_id, preferred_content_type FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_content_type = 'Article';
SELECT user_id, preferred_difficulty_level FROM user_preferences ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, SUM(time_spent_minutes) AS total_time_spent FROM user_engagement GROUP BY content_id;
SELECT user_id, engagement_date, content_id, time_spent_minutes FROM user_engagement WHERE time_spent_minutes > 30 AND content_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY engagement_date;
SELECT user_id, preferred_content_type, preferred_difficulty_level FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users, AVG(time_spent_minutes) AS avg_time_spent FROM user_engagement GROUP BY content_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type FROM content WHERE content_type = 'article';
SELECT user_id, content_type_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement JOIN user_preferences ON user_engagement.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, content_id FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type FROM content WHERE content_type = 'article';
SELECT user_id, content_id, engagement_timestamp FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_type_preference, content_category_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE content_type_preference = 'video' AND content_category_preference = 'comedy';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT content_id, title, category FROM content ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE time_spent_in_seconds > 60;
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_rating, feedback_date FROM engagement_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content.title, content.category FROM content JOIN user_engagement ON content.content_id = user_engagement.content_id;

SELECT users.username, engagement_feedback.satisfaction_rating FROM users JOIN user_engagement ON users.user_id = user_engagement.user_id JOIN engagement_feedback ON user_engagement.engagement_id = engagement_feedback.engagement_id;

SELECT engagement_feedback.feedback_text, content.title FROM engagement_feedback JOIN user_engagement ON engagement_feedback.engagement_id = user_engagement.engagement_id JOIN content ON user_engagement.content_id = content.content_id WHERE engagement_feedback.satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, title, publish_date FROM content WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, rating FROM user_interaction WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, category, priority FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 12345 AND priority > 0 ORDER BY category;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, description, category FROM content ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, category, priority FROM user_preferences WHERE priority BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY category, priority ASC;
